verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֥א <S%H4853><s%> The burden דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> of the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> for Israel נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD נֹטֶ֤ה <S%H5186><s%> which stretcheth שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> forth the heavens וְיֹסֵ֣ד <S%H3245><s%> and layeth the foundation אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְיֹצֵ֥ר <S%H3335><s%> and formeth רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7130><s%> within פ

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָ֠נֹכִי <S%H595><s%> I שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> Behold I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֧ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem סַף־ <S%H5592><s%> a cup רַ֛עַל <S%H7478><s%> of trembling לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הָעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וְגַ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> will also עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is against יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> both against Judah יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַמָּצ֖וֹר <S%H4692><s%> when they shall be in the siege עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> be against יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> [and] against Jerusalem

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will come בַיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> And in that day הַ֠הוּא <S%H1931><s%> I אָשִׂ֨ים <S%H7760><s%> will I make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem אֶ֤בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone מַֽעֲמָסָה֙ <S%H4614><s%> a burdensome לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> for all people כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֹמְסֶ֖יהָ <S%H6006><s%> all that burden שָׂר֣וֹט <S%H8295><s%> will be severely יִשָּׂרֵ֑טוּ <S%H8295><s%> injured וְנֶאֶסְפ֣וּ <S%H622><s%> be gathered together עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all גּוֹיֵ֥י <S%H1471><s%> though all the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

בַּיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אַכֶּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> I will smite כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every סוּס֙ <S%H5483><s%> every horse בַּתִּמָּה֔וֹן <S%H8541><s%> with astonishment וְרֹכְב֖וֹ <S%H7392><s%> and his rider בַּשִּׁגָּע֑וֹן <S%H7697><s%> with madness וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> upon the house יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶפְקַ֣ח <S%H6491><s%> and I will open אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> every ס֣וּס <S%H5483><s%> every horse הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people אַכֶּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> and will smite בַּֽעִוָּרֽוֹן׃ <S%H5788><s%> with blindness

וְאָֽמְר֛וּ <S%H559><s%> shall say אַלֻּפֵ֥י <S%H441><s%> And the governors יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בְּלִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> in their heart אַמְצָ֥ה <S%H556><s%> [shall be] my strength לִי֙ יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> The inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem בַּיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> their God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֡וּא <S%H1931><s%> I אָשִׂים֩ <S%H7760><s%> will I make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַלֻּפֵ֨י <S%H441><s%> the governors יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah כְּֽכִיּ֧וֹר <S%H3595><s%> like an hearth אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire בְּעֵצִ֗ים <S%H6086><s%> among the wood וּכְלַפִּ֥יד <S%H3940><s%> and like a torch אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> of fire בְּעָמִ֔יר <S%H5995><s%> in a sheaf וְאָ֨כְל֜וּ <S%H398><s%> and they shall devour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יָמִ֧ין <S%H3225><s%> on the right hand וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on שְׂמֹ֛אול <S%H8040><s%> and on the left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> all the people סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וְיָשְׁבָ֨ה <S%H3427><s%> shall be inhabited יְרוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again תַּחְתֶּ֖יהָ <S%H8478><s%> sites בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> again in her own place [even] in Jerusalem פ

וְהוֹשִׁ֧יעַ <S%H3467><s%> also shall save יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָהֳלֵ֥י <S%H168><s%> the tents יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> first לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> so לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִגְדַּ֜ל <S%H1431><s%> do not magnify תִּפְאֶ֣רֶת <S%H8597><s%> that the glory בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house דָּוִ֗יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וְתִפְאֶ֛רֶת <S%H8597><s%> and the glory יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> [themselves] against Judah

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָגֵ֤ן <S%H1598><s%> defend יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> shall the LORD בְּעַד֙ <S%H1157><s%> about יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַנִּכְשָׁ֥ל <S%H3782><s%> and he that is feeble בָּהֶ֛ם בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> among them at that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כְּדָוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> shall be as David וּבֵ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> of David כֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> [shall be] as God כְּמַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> as the angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> I אֲבַקֵּ֗שׁ <S%H1245><s%> [that] I will seek לְהַשְׁמִיד֙ <S%H8045><s%> to destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> all the nations הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> that come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem

וְשָׁפַכְתִּי֩ <S%H8210><s%> And I will pour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> upon the house דָּוִ֜יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וְעַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> over יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> and upon the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem ר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> of grace וְתַ֣חֲנוּנִ֔ים <S%H8469><s%> and of supplications וְהִבִּ֥יטוּ <S%H5027><s%> and they shall look אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom דָּקָ֑רוּ <S%H1856><s%> upon me whom they have pierced וְסָפְד֣וּ <S%H5594><s%> for him as one mourneth עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> over כְּמִסְפֵּד֙ <S%H5594><s%> mourns עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַיָּחִ֔יד <S%H3173><s%> for [his] only וְהָמֵ֥ר <S%H4843><s%> [son] and shall be in bitterness עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> over כְּהָמֵ֥ר <S%H4843><s%> for him as one that is in bitterness עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <S%H1060><s%> for [his] firstborn

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִגְדַּ֤ל <S%H1431><s%> shall there be a great הַמִּסְפֵּד֙ <S%H4553><s%> mourning בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem כְּמִסְפַּ֥ד <S%H4553><s%> as the mourning הֲדַדְ־ רִמּ֖וֹן <S%H1910><s%> of Hadadrimmon בְּבִקְעַ֥ת <S%H1237><s%> in the valley מְגִדּֽוֹן׃ <S%H4023><s%> of Megiddon

וְסָפְדָ֣ה <S%H5594><s%> shall mourn הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the land מִשְׁפָּח֥וֹת <S%H4940><s%> every מִשְׁפָּח֖וֹת <S%H4940><s%> family לְבָ֑ד <S%H905><s%> apart מִשְׁפַּ֨חַת <S%H4940><s%> the family בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> of David לְבָד֙ <S%H905><s%> itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֣ם <S%H802><s%> apart and their wives לְבָ֔ד <S%H905><s%> themselves מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <S%H4940><s%> apart the family בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house נָתָן֙ <S%H5416><s%> of Nathan לְבָ֔ד <S%H905><s%> itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> apart and their wives לְבָֽד׃ <S%H905><s%> themselves

מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <S%H4940><s%> The family בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house לֵוִי֙ <S%H3878><s%> of Levi לְבָ֔ד <S%H905><s%> itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> apart and their wives לְבָ֑ד <S%H905><s%> themselves מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <S%H4940><s%> apart the family הַשִּׁמְעִי֙ <S%H8097><s%> of Shimei לְבָ֔ד <S%H905><s%> itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> apart and their wives לְבָֽד׃ <S%H905><s%> themselves

כֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> all הַמִּשְׁפָּחוֹת֙ <S%H4940><s%> All the families הַנִּשְׁאָר֔וֹת <S%H7604><s%> that remain מִשְׁפָּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> every family מִשְׁפָּחֹ֖ת <S%H4940><s%> family לְבָ֑ד <S%H905><s%> itself וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> apart and their wives לְבָֽד׃ <S%H905><s%> themselves ס
